name: Dragon Game (niinakristiina)
description:
Dragon Game

A tiny dragon, strolling through a forest, looking for it's eggs, trying not to hit the nasty rocks flying around.  Will you get all the eggs safe?  Don't worry, just enjoy the music and the soothing nature around you, just mind the rocks.

This is a small one-level (so far) adventure game created by Niina Keränen, a game dev student from Finland. This is the first game ever designed by her, and it won't be the last.
There are some free assets used, which are listed in the game info.

Enjoy, and check back for updates and new levels in the future!
